Producer: Adam Pally, Liz Destro, Michael Zakin
Production Co: StarStream Entertainment, Destro Films, Bow and Arrow Entertainment, American Zoetrope
Rating: R (Language Throughout|Drug Use|A Disturbing Image|Sexual Content/Nudity)
Synopsis: Four months after the suicide of his fiancee (Alison Brie), a man (Thomas Middleditch) and his buddies (Adam Pally, Alex Ross Perry) decide to move forward with plans for a wild bachelor party.
Title: Joshy
